snippet: Because the kind of money that pays for a summer in the Hamptons also buys expensive tutoring, the season has become prime prep time.
abstract: New York City tutors are helping to meet the demand for summer classes in the Hamptons, with some trekking back and forth to the East End and others staying in families' guesthouses; season has become a time for students to get an uninterrupted jump in their studies, standardized testing and college admissions.
lead_paragraph: Because the kind of money that pays for a summer in the Hamptons also buys expensive tutoring, the season has become prime prep time.

headline.seo: A Hamptons Summer: Surfing, Horses and Hours of SAT Prep
headline.main: A Hamptons Summer: Beach, Horses and SAT Prep
headline.print_headline: A Hamptons Summer: Surfing, Horses and Hours of SAT Prep
